body.sentence: MFS Multimarket Income Trust, a closed-end investment trust, said it sold 110 million shares of beneficial interest at $10 a share for a total of $1.1 billion, one of the largest initial public offerings in the U.S. MFS Multimarket, for which Massachusetts Financial Services Co. will as adviser, invests in a variety of investment vehicles to obtain a high level of current income.
